name: Don't DodgeBall
description:
RULES:
In this game, you must survive for as long as possible without getting touched by a ball. In order to avoid getting touched, you can press on a ball with your mouse click to make it disappear. Note that the screen will flash red when a ball gets close to you. Use this to your advantage and start looking around when the screen becomes red!

IMPORTANT TIP:
When the game begins, click on the pointer in the middle of the screen to properly adjust your aim (WebGL is annoying). 

Songs from bensound.org
